modules.label: Core Marketing Site
modules.description: Static and semi-dynamic marketing pages driven by manifests and Champagne Canon.

modules.label: Champagne Concierge Chat
modules.description: Multi-persona, AI-assisted concierge chat UI (non-diagnostic, no PHI stored by default).

modules.label: Patient Portal Core
modules.description: Secure login shell and generic UI shell for portal features (PHI-handling backend required).

modules.label: Digital Consent
modules.description: Consent pages, signature flows, and consent audit trails in the portal layer.

modules.label: Finance & Plans
modules.description: Plan summaries, finance calculators, and payment schedule views.

modules.label: 3D Treatment Viewer
modules.description: Generic 3D viewers for veneers, implants, aligners and other assets.

modules.label: Smile Simulator
modules.description: Non-diagnostic cinematic smile visualisations using anonymised or synthetic 3D assets.

modules.label: Shade Mapping OS
modules.description: 3D shade detection & visualisation OS (no raw PHI, only abstracted shade data).

modules.label: Implant Planner Visuals
modules.description: High-level, non-diagnostic implant planning visuals with generic components.

modules.label: Emotional Lighting Layer
modules.description: Visual presets mapped from emotional states to lighting rigs and overlays.

modules.label: Micro-Motion Engine
modules.description: Global micro-motion rules and harmonisation based on Champagne Motion Canon.

modules.label: AI Content Assistant
modules.description: Non-PHI content drafting (blogs, FAQs, web copy) aligned with Canon and guard rails.

modules.label: AI Behaviour Engine
modules.description: Behavioural prediction, mood memory and cognitive load management (no PHI).

modules.label: KPI & Experience Analytics
modules.description: Aggregated KPIs and UX analytics (no per-patient PHI stored in this layer).

modules.label: Phone & Email Integration
modules.description: Lightweight integration for contact links and off-platform communications.

modules.label: Calendar Integration Shell
modules.description: Abstraction for connecting to practice management calendars (PHI behind engine).

bundles.label: Champagne Basic
bundles.description: Core marketing experience with emotional lighting and micro-motion.

bundles.label: Champagne 3D
bundles.description: Basic bundle plus the 3D treatment library and smile visualisation stack.

bundles.label: Champagne Full Stack
bundles.description: End-to-end Champagne OS including portal and AI behaviour engines.
